opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order affirmed.
Mr. Justice Cohen took no part in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Stephen J. Margolin and Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorneys, James D. Craicford, Deputy District Attorney, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Davis, Appellant.
Submitted November 9, 1970.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
Bennett P. Weinstock, for appellant.
Stephen J. Margolin and Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorneys, James D. Craicford, Deputy District Attorney, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
June 1, 1971:
